machine_metadata: Daemon Installation using Services on Windows 7
code_metadata: a simple DataFileUploadDirectory to the ucsb_data topic using the base conda class, Python 3.7 and openmsistream 1.5.2
installation_notes: check status with ManageService htmdec_producer status, or restart with ManageService htmdec_producer stop_and_restart. Details can be found and tracked in https://github.com/openmsi/EZOpenMSIStream/tree/ucsb_producer
